ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] [OT] Nvidia Drivers
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Did they actually RELEASE these or is the 6.18 driver off a leak site? ... They are actual official Detonator 3 RELEASE drivers which, with certain other
ygData.messageBody:
>
Did they actually RELEASE these or is the 6.18 driver off a "leak" site?
>

They are actual official Detonator 3 RELEASE drivers which, with certain
other games like Unreal Tournament, Quake III, MDK 2 etc, have shown a
performance increase upwards of 50% both in OpenGL and Direct3D.

I found no problems with 6.18 and EverQuest. Mind you, EQ doesn't exactly
push the average computer to the limit. The driver junkies are usually the
ones trying to squeeze every last fps out of UT and Q3.

I agree with "If it ain't broke, don't fix it"... something the Verant Spell
team have yet to learn (he said, bringing things slightly back on topic ;)

Slyde: apologies if I assume anything I shouldn't, but did you ensure that
the 5.33 drivers were completely removed before installing 6.18? Which
card/cpu/mobo combo do you have?

Alternatively, if you're only playing EQ, stick to 5.33. I noticed *zero*
difference with the new drivers. :)
